item.title: 回顾乌克兰抵抗俄罗斯的十年，这些年充满了死亡和毁灭，但也充满了坚韧和希望

item.title: 罗汉-波帕纳（Rohan Bopanna）最近成为网球公开赛时代赢得重大赛事的最年长男选手。@JasonGay 写道，他是在膝盖不好的情况下做到这一点的--而且是通过更积极的精神面貌。
item.description: Rohan Bopanna recently became the oldest male player to win a major tournament in tennis’s Open era. He did it with bad knees—and by taking a more positive mental outlook, writes @JasonGay. on.wsj.com/48sSUKC on.wsj.com/48sSUKC

item.title: 看：美国今年的国债利息支出预计将达到历史性的 8,700 亿美元。华尔街日报》的 Dion Rabouin 解释了这对市场和普通纳税人意味着什么。
item.description: Watch: The U.S. is projected to spend a historic $870 billion in interest on the national debt this year. WSJ’s Dion Rabouin explains what it could mean for markets and regular taxpayers. on.wsj.com/49hIQW0 on.wsj.com/49hIQW0

item.title: "人们认为只要是合法的，就是安全的。这完全是谬论"。受污染的大麻给使用者带来了新的健康风险。
item.description: “People consider that if it’s legal, it’s safe. It’s a complete fallacy.” Contaminated marijuana is raising new health risks for users. on.wsj.com/48md0WT on.wsj.com/48md0WT
